pkgmetadata.longdescription: Morphological and Structural Features of Medicinal Leaves // Contains a dataset of morphological and structural features of 'Medicinal LEAves (MedLEA)'. The features of each species is recorded by manually viewing the medicinal plant repository available at (http://www.instituteofayurveda.org/plants/). You can also download repository of leaf images of 1099 medicinal plants in Sri Lanka.
